originalTitle: From Hollywood to the homeland: Why African countries are courting black American stars
title: From Hollywood to the homeland: Why African countries are courting black American stars
content: Ciara and Samuel L Jackson are among the big names who have become citizens of African countries in recent years.

originalTitle: Zambian leader backs traditional Ghanaian outfit after online trolling
title: Zambian leader backs traditional Ghanaian outfit after online trolling
content: Some Zambians outraged Ghanaians by describing the outfit worn by their president as a "blouse".

originalTitle: 'They sent a letter asking to preach. Then they massacred us' - Nigerians on jihadist attack
title: 'They sent a letter asking to preach. Then they massacred us' - Nigerians on jihadist attack
content: Armed jihadists devastate a community that refused to convert to their hard-line interpretation of Islam.

originalTitle: Iranians react to ‘positive’ US-Iran talks in Oman
title: Iranians react to ‘positive’ US-Iran talks in Oman
content: Talks between Iran and the US held in Oman on Friday have been described as ‘positive’ by officials.

originalTitle: US transfers ISIL detainees to Iraq as northeast Syria base draws down
title: US transfers ISIL detainees to Iraq as northeast Syria base draws down
content: Iraq launches investigations into ISIL detainees from Syria, with 7,000 expected to arrive in total.

originalTitle: Liverpool vs Manchester City: Premier League – team news, start, lineups
title: Liverpool vs Manchester City: Premier League – team news, start, lineups
content: City travel to Anfield hoping for win over defending champions Liverpool to keep within reach of league leaders Arsenal.

originalTitle: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
title: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
content: The Ukrainian leader says difficult issues remain, as Russia carries out further strikes on energy facilities.

originalTitle: Trump says he 'didn't see' part of video with racist clip depicting Obamas as apes
title: Trump says he 'didn't see' part of video with racist clip depicting Obamas as apes
content: The US president says he "didn't make a mistake", adding he had only seen the beginning of the video before it was posted.

originalTitle: Milan-Cortina Games begin with vibrant opening ceremony
title: Milan-Cortina Games begin with vibrant opening ceremony
content: Andrea Bocelli and Mariah Carey perform as part of vibrant opening ceremony for the Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics.

originalTitle: A result that puts Leeds safe, Forest in trouble - and Dyche in doubt?
title: A result that puts Leeds safe, Forest in trouble - and Dyche in doubt?
content: After Leeds' win over Nottingham Forest on Friday, BBC Sport looks at what it all means for the Premier League relegation battle.

originalTitle: Some 'dark days and nights' at Arsenal, happiness at Sunderland
title: Some 'dark days and nights' at Arsenal, happiness at Sunderland
content: Granit Xhaka sits down with Kelly Somers to talk about his motivation for joining Sunderland, and falling out with the Arsenal fans.

originalTitle: Barcelona withdraw from European Super League project
title: Barcelona withdraw from European Super League project
content: Barcelona withdraw from the European Super League project, leaving rivals Real Madrid as the only one of the original 12 clubs still signed up to the plans.
